# The Nintendo Switch 

<style>
  section {
  background: rgb(213,241,255);

# What is it?


![bg left](https://smarthomesounds.sirv.com/live-magento/catalog/product/n/i/nintendoswitch-hw-main.png?profile=smarthome&canvas.width=450&canvas.height=600&canvas.color=ffffff&canvas.opacity=0&w=450&h=600)

- The nintendo switch is a video game console released by Nintendo on March 3, 2017
- It is a tablet that can either be docked as a home console, or used as a portable device - making it a hybrid console 

---

![bg](data:image/png;base64,)

# Nintendo

- Nintendo Co is a Japanese company founded in 1889
- Main office located in Kyoto, Japan
- Gained international popularity with the release of "Donkey Kong" in 1981
- Since then, produced some of the most successful consoles in the video game industry, such as the Nintendo DS, Wii, Game Boy  and the Nintento Switch
- In 2023, it had a total net income of **3.156 billion** dollars 

---
![bg right](https://cdn-media-1.freecodecamp.org/images/1*5JiEK0hxlV3vXe3Y1G86TQ.jpeg) 

# How it is made

- Two main types of raw materials: metals (aluminum, gold, iron , zinc) and plastics
- The screen itself made of clear plastic rather than glass, making it very vulnerable to scratches 
- Costs about $257 dollars to manufacture

--- 

# Regular Model

![bg right](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRms8odfr9aZ6FEOLLs46mo1IwDbxwFpOpd1g&usqp=CAU)

- **First** release of Nintendo Switch
- 6.2 inch LCD screen with 32 GB of internal storage
- Able to connect Nintendo switch dock on a TV
- Includes set of Joy-Con controllers 

---

# OLED Model 

- **Newest** release of Nintendo Switch
- bigger and brighter 7 inch OLED screen
- 64GB of internal storage 
- Includes a LAN port, allowing you to connect it to a local network 

![bg right](https://www.nintendo.com/sg/hardware/switch/compare/img/compare_oled.jpg)

--- 

# LITE Model

- Smaller and more lightweight than regular switch models
- **ONLY** has a handheld mode, with same gaming experience as regular models
- Two-thirds of the price of regular models, and able to play all of the switch games 

![bg right](https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/U7EAAOSwyIllFHEq/s-l400.jpg)


--- 


# Where can you get it?

![bg right ](https://rechiretail.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Store-Design-2.jpg)

- Almost every gaming/tech shop will sell the nintendo switch, including Best Buy, Walmart, and Target
- Regular Model: **$399.99 CAD**
- OLED Model: **$449.99 CAD**
- LITE: **$259.99 CAD**

---

# Competitors

- Because the Nintendo Switch is part of the video game industry, there are many products in direct competition with it
  - ex. Microsoft's XBOX's and Sony's Playstations offer similar, often better experiences than the Nintendo Switch
  - However, the Switch's affordability and versatile gaming experience makes it one of the most sought after consoles by all gamers throughout the world

---
# Best Selling Games

1. Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (60.58 million sold)
2. Animal Crossing: New Horizons (44.79 million sold)
3. Super Smash Bros Ultimate (33.67 million sold)

![bg right](https://imgix.bustle.com/fatherly/2021/11/nintendo-switch-games-family.jpg?w=1200&h=630&fit=crop&crop=faces&fm=jpg)



---

# Cool Facts

- It has a built-in voice chat feature that lets you talk to your friends while you play
- You can pair Joy-cons with an Andriod, Mac, or PC
  - Just by downloading a simple app, you're able to enjoy the Joy-Cons on multiple devices and take the gaming experience to the next level 
- The Switch is the world's first hybrid console (able to be used with a TV as well as being portable )
- Nintendo Labo, a kit designed to enable gamers to build their own physcial add-ons for the Switch was released in 2018 

---

# Why I like it

 - Because it's portable, I am able to bring it around with me anywhere I like
 - Extremely versatile: I can play an infinite number of games on it 
 - Despite the size, it is a very powerful machine that is able to support very heavy games 
 - I think it is very cute and aesthetic and I'm able to decorate it however I like 

---
